titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Papers of the Michigan Academy of Science, Arts and Letters.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Papers of the Michigan Academy of Science, Arts and Letters.

odd.head: Issuing Body
odd.p: Vols. for 1923- issued under the joint direction of the council of the academy and of the executive board of the Graduate School of the University of Michigan ..."

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Ann Arbor [etc.] : Published for the Michigan Academy of Science, Arts and Letters by the University of Michigan Press [etc.], 1923-1968.

odd.head: Bibliography
odd.p: Most of the papers include bibliographies.

archdesc.scopecontent: Vols. 1-53 contain papers submitted at the annual meetings in 1921-1967.

corpname.primary_name: Michigan Academy of Science, Arts, and Letters
Michigan Academy of Science, Arts, and Letters
Horace H. Rackham School of Graduate Studies
